languages.text: "Флот Осознание //считает разумным//испытывает убеждение//, что запретные знания, попавшие в руки мирян, становятся причинами разрушений и надругательств, противных воле Омниссии. Слабость разума и воли отпирают двери ксеноереси, в которой миряне погрязают без остатка".

"The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."
languages.original_text: "Флот Осознание //считает разумным//испытывает убеждение//, что запретные знания, попавшие в руки мирян, становятся причинами разрушений и надругательств, противных воле Омниссии. Слабость разума и воли отпирают двери ксеноереси, в которой миряне погрязают без остатка".

traits.locale_text: "The Cognisance Fleet finds it reasonable to believe/believes that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

"The Cognisance Fleet finds it reasonable to believe/believes that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

"The Cognisance Fleet finds it reasonable to believe/believes that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

"The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

languages.text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は、禁じられた知識が信徒に手に渡ると、破滅および万機神の意志に反する違反が引き起こされると//信ずるに足ると判断する//信じている//。精神と意志の弱さは異星異端性を解き放ち、信徒を蝕みます」
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

traits.locale_text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は、禁じられた知識が信徒に手に渡ると、破滅および万機神の意志に反する違反が引き起こされると//信ずるに足ると判断する//信じている//。精神と意志の弱さは異星異端性を解き放ち、信徒を蝕みます」

languages.text: “真理开拓者舰队//有理由相信//确信//，教外人士手中的禁忌知识会造成对欧姆尼塞亚意志的破坏与违背。思想和意志的软弱将使异形造物脱离控制，彻底摧毁教外人士。”
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

traits.locale_text: “真理开拓者舰队//有理由相信//确信//，教外人士手中的禁忌知识会造成对欧姆尼塞亚意志的破坏与违背。思想和意志的软弱将使异形造物脱离控制，彻底摧毁教外人士。”

languages.text: «La Flota Conciencia //considera razonable creer//cree// que el conocimiento prohibido en manos de los laicos causa destrucción e infracciones que atentan contra la voluntad del Omnissiah. La debilidad de la mente y la voluntad desencadena la xenoherejía, que consume a los laicos por completo».
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

traits.locale_text: «La Flota Conciencia //considera razonable creer//cree// que el conocimiento prohibido en manos de los laicos causa destrucción e infracciones que atentan contra la voluntad del Omnissiah. La debilidad de la mente y la voluntad desencadena la xenoherejía, que consume a los laicos por completo».

languages.text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance //estime raisonnable de penser//pense// qu'entre des mains non initiées, tout savoir interdit est source de destruction et d'infractions allant à l'encontre de la volonté de l'Omnimessie. La faiblesse d'esprit et le manque de volonté déclenchent une xénohérésie qui dévore entièrement les profanes. »
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

traits.locale_text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance //estime raisonnable de penser//pense// qu'entre des mains non initiées, tout savoir interdit est source de destruction et d'infractions allant à l'encontre de la volonté de l'Omnimessie. La faiblesse d'esprit et le manque de volonté déclenchent une xénohérésie qui dévore entièrement les profanes. »

languages.text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte //hält die Ansicht für vernünftig//glaubt//, dass verbotenes Wissen in den Händen von Laien zu Zerstörung und Verstößen gegen den Willen des Omnissiah führt. Schwacher Geist und Wille gebären Xenohäresie, die Laien komplett verschlingt."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte //hält die Ansicht für vernünftig//glaubt//, dass verbotenes Wissen in den Händen von Laien zu Zerstörung und Verstößen gegen den Willen des Omnissiah führt. Schwacher Geist und Wille gebären Xenohäresie, die Laien komplett verschlingt."

languages.text: "Malumat Filosu, ruhban dışı sınıfın eline geçebilecek yasaklı bilgilerin yıkıma ve Hermesih'in iradesini ihlale yol açacağına //inanmayı mantıklı bulur//inanır//. Zeno kâfirliği, zihin ve iradenin zayıflığından doğar ki bu da ruhban dışı sınıfı yiyip tüketir."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet //finds it reasonable to believe//believes// that forbidden knowledge in the hands of the laity causes destruction and violations that go against the Omnissiah's will. Weakness of mind and will unleashes xenoheresy, which consumes the laity whole."

traits.locale_text: "Malumat Filosu, kâfirlerin eline düşen yasaklı bilgilerin yıkıma ve Hermesih'in iradesine karşı gelen davranışlara yol açacağına //inanmayı mantıklı buluyor//inanıyor//. Zeno kâfirlik zihin ve iradenin zayıflığından doğar, bu da kâfirleri yiyip bitirir."
